name: Gmail 2022 Improved
description:
Small improvements for Gmail's 2022 redesign:
  • Arial interface font
  • Lines and contrast between sections
  • Compact main menu
  • Borders around text buttons
  • No animated transitions
Compatible with most Gmail themes
additional_info: Tested in Firefox and Vivaldi. I recommend the Stylus extension, for better security and privacy than Stylish. v1.3.0 (2022-12-14): updated for Gmail's 2022 redesign v1.2.2 (2018-10-12): subject header tweaks v1.2.0 (2018-10-07): borders now just on text-label buttons; Smart replies re-enabled because you can now turn them off in Gmail settings; added lines & contrast; fixed letter spacing; added colored markers to the main menu v1.1.1 (2018-10-03): fixed fonts for contact hovercards v1.1.0 (2018-10-01): narrower menu; hidden smart reply buttons v1.0.0 (2018-09-30): initial release
